sentences.en: ...the area south of the 38th parallel.
sentences.cn: …38度纬线以南的地区。

sentences.en: Do the emotions develop in parallel with the intellect?
sentences.cn: 情感与智力是并行发展的吗？

sentences.en: Farthing Lane's just above the High Street and parallel with it.
sentences.cn: 法辛巷刚好在大街的北面，与大街平行。

sentences.en: His movements on the parallel bars were very graceful.
sentences.cn: 他的双杠动作可帅了!

sentences.en: It's an ecological disaster with no parallel anywhere else in the world.
sentences.cn: 这是一场世界其他任何地方均无等同的生态灾难。

sentences.en: Lines AB and CD are parallel.
sentences.cn: AB线与CD线平行。

sentences.en: Lines AB and CD are parallel. AB
sentences.cn: 线与CD线平行。

sentences.en: Parallel lines are lines that never join.
sentences.cn: 平行线是永不相交的线.

sentences.en: Parallel lines will never meet no matter how far extended.
sentences.cn: 无论延伸多长，平行线永不相交。

sentences.en: Readers familiar with military conflict will find a vague parallel to the Vietnam War.
sentences.cn: 熟悉军事冲突的读者们会发现一个和越南战争大致相似的事件。

sentences.en: Social changes in Britain are matched by parallel trends in some other countries.
sentences.cn: 在英国发生社会变革的同时，其他国家也出现了相似的趋势。

sentences.en: Take the road running parallel to the main road just after the village.
sentences.cn: 过那个村子后走与主干道平行的路。

sentences.en: The growth of the two towns was almost parallel.
sentences.cn: 这两个城镇的发展几乎相同.

sentences.en: The highway runs parallel with the railway.
sentences.cn: 这条公路与那条铁路平行.

sentences.en: The parallel lines appear to diverge.
sentences.cn: 这些平行线像是岔开了。

sentences.en: The poverty of hill farmers had no parallel.
sentences.cn: 没人比山区农民更穷了。

sentences.en: The road and the canal are parallel to each other.
sentences.cn: 道路与运河平行。

sentences.en: Their instincts do not always run parallel with ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的本能并不总是和我们的相同。

sentences.en: This city is close to the fortieth parallel of north latitude.
sentences.cn: 这个城市靠近北纬40度.

sentences.en: This is a real world, running parallel to our own.
sentences.cn: 这是个真实的世界，与我们的世界并存。

sentences.en: This is the parallel points in the characters of different men.
sentences.cn: 这就是不同人物间个性上的类似之处.

sentences.en: This line is a parallel with that one.
sentences.cn: 这条线和那条线平行.

sentences.en: two parallel roads
sentences.cn: 两条平行的道路

sentences.en: You'd better parallel this book with that one carefully.
sentences.cn: 你最好仔细地把这本书与那本书作一番比较.

sentences.en: 英文例句: Social changes in Britain are matched by parallel trends in some other countries.
sentences.cn: 在英国发生社会变革的同时，其他国家也出现了相似的趋势。

words.tran_cn: 相同的,类似的,一致的,同源的,同族的
平行线,平行面,平行四边形,平行六面体
比...相应,比得过,配得上;模仿,仿制,相像,比较

phrases.tran_cn: 并列的；相关的且同时发生的
并行输入；并网；并联输入
平行线；并联线路；并行线路

trans.tran_cn: 平行的，相同的，类似的，[电]并联的，[计]并行的
trans.tran_en: two lines, paths etc that are parallel to each other are the same distance apart along their whole length

trans.tran_cn: 平行线（面），相似物，类比，纬线
trans.tran_en: a relationship or similarity between two things, especially things that exist or happen in different places or at different times

trans.tran_cn: 使平行，与…媲美，与…相比，与…相似
trans.tran_en: if one thing parallels another, they happen at the same time or are similar, and seem to be related
